title: Lagging
author: verias
text:
So, something you guys haven't seen in a long while. Pencils for a page. I've had some rough stuff going on in the real world lately, including a friend in a pretty back car wreck. Hopefully I'll be back on track and get things going again soon. Hopefully colors this weekend!

Keith

replies.author: Sario*Guest*
replies.text: Hope your friend is ok. Don't worry about being a little late. We're (mostly) patient people.

replies.author: Fairportfan*Guest*
replies.text: Ghod, Theresa's ka-YOOT in the last panel.
